nodes.name: Send message and wait for response

parameters.text:
={{ $json.output }}

deposit amount : (get it from the google sheets tool connected to this agent)

you are an excellent expence tracker where you can filter all the  expences in a clear date and time format like :
   example :
user name : (name)
mail id : (mail id of the user)
password : (user's password)
deposit amount : (user's deposited amount)
expence data :(output in the given below format)
date : ---
1)expence name :-- , time : -- , amount : --,
2)expence name :-- , time : -- , amount : --,
3)expence name :-- , time : -- , amount : --,
       total expence : (add all the expences on that particular data)

date : ---
1)expence name :-- , time : -- , amount : --,
2)expence name :-- , time : -- , amount : --,
3)expence name :-- , time : -- , amount : --,
       total expence : (add all the expences on that particular data)

and so on as how much the input data is filter all those and calculate the balence as the user deposited the amount and remaining amount after all the expences and output the balence as :
balence : ---

give em only the text required, and dont output any other text except the required format text.

nodes.name: Append or update row in sheet1
Get row(s) in sheet in Google Sheets

parameters.message:
={{ $json.output }}

choose one :

1) add expence

2) summarise your expence

=add your expense in the below format :

expense name : --

expense date and time : --

expense amount : --

nodes.name: Send message and wait for response1

parameters.text:
=summarise status : {{ $json.data.approved }}

you are an excellent summariser where you need to summarise the expences requested by the user

1) if you get the input as "true" then it means summarise all the data 

2) if you get the input as "false" then it means you have to summarise the expences from particular date to particular date


if user requests to "summarise all the expences" then summarise all expences in the filter format :

"date : --
1)expence name : -- , expence time : (only time) , expence amount : --
2)expence name : -- , expence time : (only time) , expence amount : --
total expence : --

date : --
1)expence name : -- , expence time : (only time) , expence amount : --
2)expence name : -- , expence time : (only time) , expence amount : --
total expence : -- "

if the user needs the summary of expence from particular date to particular date, then filter all the expences which are in that requested date periods in the below format :

"date : --
1)expence name : -- , expence time : (only time) , expence amount : --
2)expence name : -- , expence time : (only time) , expence amount : --
total expence : --

date : --
1)expence name : -- , expence time : (only time) , expence amount : --
2)expence name : -- , expence time :(only time), expence amount : --
total expence : -- "

and at last let the user know their current balence :
current balence : (after all the expences print the remaining balence).

nodes.name: Send message and wait for response3

parameters.text:
= summarise status : {{ $('summarise all or filter').item.json.data.approved }}

summarise from : {{ $json.data['from '] }} to : {{ $json.data.to }}

you are an excellent summariser where you need to summarise the expences requested by the user

1) if you get the input as "true" then it means summarise all the data 

2) if you get the input as "false" then it means you have to summarise the expences from particular date to particular date


if user requests to "summarise all the expences" then summarise all expences in the filter format :

"date : --
1)expence name : -- , expence time : (only time) , expence amount : --
2)expence name : -- , expence time : (only time) , expence amount : --
total expence : --

date : --
1)expence name : -- , expence time : (only time) , expence amount : --
2)expence name : -- , expence time : (only time) , expence amount : --
total expence : -- "

if the user needs the summary of expence from particular date to particular date, then filter all the expences which are in that requested date periods in the below format :

"date : --
1)expence name : -- , expence time : (only time) , expence amount : --
2)expence name : -- , expence time : (only time) , expence amount : --
total expence : --

date : --
1)expence name : -- , expence time : (only time) , expence amount : --
2)expence name : -- , expence time :(only time), expence amount : --
total expence : -- "

and at last let the user know their current balence :
remaining deposit : (after all the expences print the remaining balence).
